## PdfXmpMetadata.Clear method

Removes all elements from the object.

```csharp
public void Clear()
```

### Examples

```csharp
PdfXmpMetadata xmp = new PdfXmpMetadata();
xmp.BindPdf("input.pdf");
xmp.Clear();
```
